sentence: Comparing units outstanding versus one week ago at the coverage universe of ETFs at ETF Channel, the biggest inflow was seen in the Consumer Staples Select Sector SPDR Fund ( XLP ), which added 5,700,000 units, or a 3.5% increase week over week.
Among the largest underlying components of XLP, in morning trading today Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) is up about 0.2%, and Coca-Cola Company ( KO ) is lower by about 0.1%.

And on a percentage change basis, the ETF with the biggest increase in inflows was the Proshares UltraShort MSCI Brazil Capped ( BZQ ), which added 100,000 units, for a 36.4% increase in outstanding units.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
